attributes.title: CONTAINS A VIRUS. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.review: This app requires so much memory that I had to delete ALL my other apps AND all the pictures of my dog Chichi from my phone. Then once it had finally downloaded it crashed my phone, which then would not turn on for more than a minute and kept crashing. I had to factory reset it just to write this review. Finally opening the app I saw it contains extremely racist, homophobic, sexist, and xenophobic content and I uninstalled immediately. My children use my phone sometimes and I do not want them being exposed to such filth. This app will break your phone and melt your brain cells to boot. DO NOT INSTALL IT!

attributes.title: TRULY THE WORST APP

attributes.title: Never AGAIN!
attributes.review: App took 13 minutes to even load on my screen when I first download it! And to top it off I thought this was a presidential campaign. Why do I have a racist clown holding the black panther fist as soon as it decides to open. I thought Apple had strict app rules but seeing that this app made it to the store I am really eerie about that. How could the App Store allow a racist, rapist, misogynist clown upload to such a sacred store we call our App Store. I am hoping that Apple will review this app and take it down as soon as possible as it is obviously promoting a racist and rapist for our country. Thank you for joining my ted talk.

attributes.title: absolutely terrifying!!

It absolutely terrified me and I am on a miner I might not be able to sleep at night after opening this app the terrible thing it should me really terrified me. No human should go through that.

attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: Heard stories where the works was simple. But something changed. A man, with the objective to watch the world burn, was born. He grew up believing he deserved the best. He was the best, he thought. As he grew older, his arrogance free with him. He got money, power, and fame. He washed more. To be worshipped. He became a part of trafficking. Poor girls as young as eight, Target away to be used as machines for pleasure. Horrific sights. Didn‚Äôt like- no, despised those of rich culture. He wished to ‚Äúrule the nation‚Äù. Four difficult years. Those that had to experience the effects of the man‚Äôs purposeful mistakes were and are warriors. The man now wishes to make an application. This platform must fall.

attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE MY WASHING MACHINE!!!
attributes.review: if i could give a 0 star review i would. i was walking my pet rock to go get a smoothie from walmart and then i got lost on the way to walmart and ended up in kentucky!?! (im NOT from kentucky) then i had to find a stupid walmart in kentucky and then someone hit my pet rock with their CAR. i planned a funeral and then suddenly i blacked out and i was in my room back in not kentucky and then i went to go get a big mac from burger king and after i got my smoothie i spilt it all over my shirt and i wanted to heat up my 8 day old chicken nuggets but i couldnt so i went to go take a nap in the washing machine and IT WOULDNT TURN ON!!!!!!!! 0/10 would not reccomend

attributes.title: GIVES DEVICES A VIRUS AND IS TRASH
attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, my phone was immediately bombarded with pop-up adds and other strange glitches even when i left the app! Please do yourself a favor and DO NOT download this app. I brought it to the apple store to try and get the virus type thing fixed, but they couldn‚Äôt figure it out and i can‚Äôt afford a new phone. Really thought that a whole administration could make an app that at least somewhat works, but i guess not. It would be actually best if it actually got deleted just to prevent others from going through the same experience i did!!! :((

attributes.title: Worst app I‚Äôve ever downloaded!!

It‚Äôs driving me mad I can‚Äôt even turn my phone off to avoid it because the app won‚Äôt let me. Don‚Äôt get this app!
